github.vulpine.binary

Class Bit

  • java.lang.Object
    • github.vulpine.binary.Bit

  • public class Bit
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Bit represents a Bit, with of value 0 or 1.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bit(boolean value)
      Constructs a Bit object using the boolean value.
      Bit(java.lang.String value)
      Constructs a Bit object using a string of one binary digit ("0" or "1").

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String toString()
      Creates a string representation of the value of this Bit.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bit

        public Bit(boolean value)
        Constructs a Bit object using the boolean value. The boolean value of true is mapped to 1 and the boolean value of false mapped to 0.
        Parameters:
        A - byte value.

      • Bit

        public Bit(java.lang.String value)
        Constructs a Bit object using a string of one binary digit ("0" or "1").
        Parameters:
        A - string of one binary digit ("0" or "1").

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a string representation of the value of this Bit. Will have the value of 0 or 1.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representation of this Bit object.
